title: Buffalo Bruce's Mercantile
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. While their specialty is barbecue, they feature a separate vegetarian menu with vegan options that are available throughout the week, and on Saturdays they feature a raw and vegan menu.  Everything vegetarian and vegan is cooked separately. They also serve coffee and espresso drinks. There is limited space to sit inside, but there is plenty of seating out front and around the back of the building. Wi-fi.
